name: Malcolm Brogdon
comment: Brogdon (Achilles) is probable for Tuesday's matchup against the Bucks, Jared Weiss of The Athletic reports.

name: Grant Williams
comment: Williams is questionable for Tuesday's game against the Bucks due to right elbow swelling.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) has been ruled out for Tuesday's matchup against the Bucks, Jared Weiss of The Athletic reports.

name: Jayson Tatum
comment: Tatum (illness) is doubtful for Tuesday's game against the Bucks.

name: Jaylen Brown
comment: Brown's (face) status will be updated next week, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Seth Curry
comment: Curry (thigh) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Knicks, Chris Milholen of SI.com reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee)  remains out for Monday's game against Atlanta.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre suggested Thursday that he expects to transition into a smaller brace to protect his surgically repaired left hand, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports. He anticipates wearing the brace for 1-to-2 weeks. "And then right after [the 1-to-2-week period] we'll be at All-Star break," Oubre said. "And then that's, Godspeed, the plan to come back."

name: Derrick Jones Jr.
comment: Jones won't return to Monday's game against the Magic due to a left adductor strain, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Bulls vice president Arturas Karnisovas said Saturday that Ball (knee) will have his status updated following the All-Star break, Brian Dulik of The Associated Press reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Head coach Billy Donovan said Monday that Green (knee) still isn't running, and it's unclear when he'll be able to suit up again, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber (hamstring) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against Minnesota.

name: Davis Bertans
comment: Bertans (calf) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Jamal Murray
comment: Murray (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Heat, Katy Winge of Altitude Sports reports.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against Miami.

name: Zeke Nnaji
comment: Nnaji (shoulder) will not play Monday versus Miami.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Pistons head coach Dwane Casey said Friday that Bagley (hand) is "getting close" to a return to the court, Mike Curtis of The Detroit News reports.

name: James Wiseman
comment: Wiseman will be able to practice with the Pistons on Monday after Detroit finalized its four-team trade with the Warriors, Trail Blazers and Hawks on Sunday, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Gary Payton II
comment: Warriors GM Bob Myers said Payton (core muscle injury) will be re-evaluated in one month according to Anthony Slater of The Athletic.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip)  will not play Monday against Washington and remains without a timetable.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: Curry (lower leg) will not take the floor before the All-Star break, Jason Anderson of The Sacramento Bee reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the 76ers.

name: LeBron James
comment: James (ankle) has already been ruled out for Monday's game against Portland but should be cleared to return Wednesday against New Orleans, Broderick Turner of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Mo Bamba
comment: Bamba (suspension) is out Monday against the Trail Blazers, Harrison Faigen of SBNation.com reports.

name: Scotty Pippen Jr.
comment: The Lakers assigned Pippen (concussion) to the South bay Lakers of the G League on Friday, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Victor Oladipo
comment: Oladipo (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Nuggets.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra intimated Saturday that Jovic (back) will remain sidelined through the All-Star break, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra intimated Saturday that Robinson (finger) will remain sidelined through the All-Star break, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Kyle Lowry
comment: Lowry (knee) won't make his return until after the All-Star break, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven's left ankle has fully healed from surgery, and he's been cleared for high-impact work, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) has been ruled out for Tuesday's matchup against the Bucks.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo (knee) is probable for Tuesday's game against the Celtics.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder (recently traded) will be unavailable Tuesday against Boston and Thursday against Chicago, Gary Washburn of The Boston Globe reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves general manager Tim Connelly relayed Tuesday that Towns (calf) remains sidelined indefinitely, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) is listed as out for Monday's game against the Thunder.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) has suffered a setback in his rehab and will be sidelined for several more weeks, Christian Clark of The New Orleans Times-Picayune reports.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Knicks team owner James Dolan said Thursday in his appearance on the "Good Day New York" program that Robinson (thumb) will be sidelined for four more weeks, Steve Popper of Newsday reports.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: R.J. Hampton
comment: Hampton won't travel with the Magic during its two-game road trip in Chicago and Toronto on Monday and Tuesday and could be waived or have the remainder of his contract bought out, Khobi Price of the Orlando Sentinel reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) took part in his first practice session with the Suns on Monday, but team officials ruled him out for Phoenix's final two games before the All-Star break Tuesday versus the Kings and Thursday versus the Clippers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) will be re-evaluated after the All-Star break according to Duane Rankin of the Arizona Republic.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated after the All-Star break, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Lakers.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Lakers.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Nurkic is in line to be sidelined through the All-Star break after an MRI on Thursday revealed a left calf strain.

name: Malik Monk
comment: Monk (ankle) won't play Tuesday against the Suns and will be re-evaluated after the All-Star break, Kings media member Frankie Cartoscelli reports.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (thigh) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against Cleveland, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Khem Birch
comment: Birch (knee) isn't expected to make his Spurs debut until after the All-Star break, Jeff McDonald of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) said Friday that he still doesn't have a specific return date, but he's still aiming to be back sometime after the All-Star break, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (wrist) will remain out for Tuesday's game against the Magic.

name: Gary Trent Jr.
comment: Trent is questionable for Tuesday against the Magic with a left calf strain according to Josh Lewenberg of TSN Sports.

name: Precious Achiuwa
comment: Achiuwa is questionable for Tuesday's game against Orlando due to a right ankle sprain, Josh Lewenberg of TSN.ca reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Russell Westbrook
comment: Westbrook, who remains out for Saturday's game against the Knicks, met with Jazz management after being acquired from the Lakers on Thursday and is expected to take time prior to the All-Star break before deciding whether to pursue a buyout with Utah or remain with the team for the rest of the season, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Kyle Kuzma
comment: Kuzma (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup in Golden State.
